docs.snippet: By tradition, personal ambitions at the Democratic National Convention are largely unspoken, but those who are eager to break out are in attendance....
docs.lead_paragraph: By tradition, personal ambitions at the Democratic National Convention are largely unspoken, but those who are eager to break out are in attendance.
docs.abstract: Many ambitious political leaders in attendance at Democratic National Convention are looking past 2016 elections and working rooms full of party's delegates, donors and activists, all of whom will be crucial for future pursuit of any national campaign in 2020 or later.

headline.main: Democrats Discreetly Turn Attention to Presidential Prospects of the Future
headline.print_headline: A Chance for Future Stars to Emerge
